original_title: For A Few More Yen They Kill
overview: A blood war erupts when Tang Shaw, a gambling mob boss, discovers his henchmen have been skimming the casino till. Tang must have the thieves killed quickly as an example to others. But before he can, the henchmen assemble their own band of ruthless killers. Control of the casino and all its wealth lies on the quick fists and sharp swords of the warriors. It's an all-out bloodbath spectacular pitting the world's most highly trained Karate mercenaries against one another.
title: For A Few More Yen They Kill
